!Karakawei: Friend of the Elroki, be welcome here. You need not tell me who you are or why you are -- the ancestors surrounding me have already told me that you are the outsider destined by fate to save the Elroki tribe from the evil facing it.%% Outsider, my ancestors wish to convey a message to you through me. Are you ready to hear it?%% [Quest _124_MeetingTheElroki shaman_caracawe_q0124_03.htm|Say that you are ready.]
